title: Chronic immune activation and accelerated immune aging among HIV-infected adults receiving suppressive antiretroviral therapy for at least 12 years in an African cohort
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Damalie Nakanjako, Rose Nabatanzi, Isaac Ssinabulya, Lois Bayigga, Agnes Kiragga, Grace Banturaki, Barbara Castelnuovo
